question.title: Get all values from listview items
question.body:
How to get value from all Textfield list inside listview?

 ListView list = new ListView("listview", userList) {
        protected void populateItem(ListItem item) {
            item.add(new TextField<String>("firstname", someModel));
        }
    };

like list.getinputs() that returns list of Texfields showed in listview

answers.body:
Apache Wicket uses models to keep the data for the form components.

The following code

item.add(new TextField<String>("firstname"));

would throw a runtime exception if Wicket cannot find the IModel instance that should store the data for this text field.

You should either change it to:

item.add(new TextField<String>("firstname", someModel));
// where someModel is an instance of IModel

or use an hierarchical model like CompoundPropertyModel that knows how to provide the data for any child component(s).

I'd recommend you to check the documentation and/or some examples / repeater+forms examples
